Class Order

java.lang.Object
  Order

public class Order
extends java.lang.Object

This class contains all the information regarding specific food orders.

Author:
Henry

Field Summary
private  java.lang.String comments
          Any comments regarding the dish, such as allergies or specific ingredients will be kept here.
private  long finishedTime
          The time the food is cooked.
private  java.lang.String foodName
          Name of the order
private  Bill itsBill
          A reference to the bill to which it belongs
private  double price
          The value of the food
private  boolean status
          By default, will set status to 0, indicating the order is not ready.
 
Constructor Summary
Order(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String com, Bill b)
           
 
Method Summary
 java.lang.String getComment()
          Gets the comment associated with the order
 java.lang.String getFoodName()
          Gets the name of the order
 double getPrice()
          Gets the price of the order
 boolean getStatus()
          Gets the status of the order
 void setStatusDone()
          Sets the status of the order as done, and also mark when the order is finished.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Field Detail

foodName

private java.lang.String foodName
Name of the order

price

private double price
The value of the food

status

private boolean status
By default, will set status to 0, indicating the order is not ready. Once the cook makes the order and is ready to give to the customer, the status is set to 1.

comments

private java.lang.String comments
Any comments regarding the dish, such as allergies or specific ingredients will be kept here.

itsBill

private Bill itsBill
A reference to the bill to which it belongs

finishedTime

private long finishedTime
The time the food is cooked.

             java.lang.String com,
             Bill b)
Method Detail

getFoodName

public java.lang.String getFoodName()
Gets the name of the order

Returns:
A string containing the food name

getPrice

public double getPrice()
Gets the price of the order

Returns:
The price of the order as a double

getComment

public java.lang.String getComment()
Gets the comment associated with the order

Returns:
A string containing the comment

setStatusDone

public void setStatusDone()
Sets the status of the order as done, and also mark when the order is finished.

getStatus

public boolean getStatus()
Gets the status of the order

Returns:
A boolean value, with true indicating the order is done, and false indicating the order is not done
